Shrink a number by dividing it into halves.

Shrink a number by dividing it into halves.

shrink.halves(x)

Arguments

x

number to produce halves of

Examples

shrink.towards(45)
#> function(x) {
#>         if (destination == x) {
#>             c()
#>         } else {
#>             # Halve the operands before subtracting them so they don't overflow.
#>             diff <- x - destination
#>             c(destination, x - shrink.halves(diff))
#>         }
#>     }
#> <environment: 0x7f9f3d842d10>
# 22 11  5  2  1
